title: Stickman Escape School
description: Stickman Escape School is a fun adventure game where you need to find a way to escape from school. You are a student who doesn't exactly like to study and decides to cut class and ditch your boring teacher's class. There are a lot of different items you could use to escape from school, but if you choose the wrong one, you can be caught and forced to study for pretty much your entire life. The risks are steep, but the rewards are plentyâ€”you get to skip school! Try to choose the right items so you can escape successfully!
